### Install locally

We'll required Python for this tutorial. You can download it [here](https://www.python.org/downloads/).

1. Clone the Github repo and install dependencies

```bash
git clone https://github.com/dkedar7/show_your_work
```

2. Install dependencies

Open the repo with your favorite text editor

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

3. Launch Jupyter Lab to follow along

```bash
jupyter lab
```

### Test your setup

Launch a new Jupyter notebook, and run the following cell

```python
from fast_dash import fastdash

@fastdash
def simple_app(text: str):
    output_text = "This is my first Fast Dash app!"
    return output_text
```
